bibl.title: The Hauswaldt Papyri. A Third Century B.C. Family Dossier from Edfu.
bibl.note: figg., arbres généal., graphiques et 9 pll.

New edition of the "archive of Pabous" (265-208 B.C.). The papyri contain important evidence for eponymous priest protocols, for chronology and for the geography and irrigation terminology of the Edfu nome. P. Hauswaldt 2, 8 and 9 have a Greek registration docket.
bibl.seg: MANNING Joseph G. (Transcription, Translation and Commentary by), The Hauswaldt Papyri. A Third Century B.C. Family Dossier from Edfu. (Demotische Studien. 12.)
Sommerhausen, Gisela Zauzich, 1997, 4°, ix-212 pp., figg., arbres généal., graphiques et 9 pll. ISBN 3-924151-05-9.

New edition of the "archive of Pabous" (265-208 B.C.). The papyri contain important evidence for eponymous priest protocols, for chronology and for the geography and irrigation terminology of the Edfu nome. P. Hauswaldt 2, 8 and 9 have a Greek registration docket.
